item.title: Quick Reference
item.description: A quick reference doc for reminders on how to update this site.

item.title: The Making Of
item.description: My contribution to the noble tradition of the first blog post written by a techie being about how the author set up their blog. Documentation of my process of building this site, using Hugo.
